response.original_title: In Search of the American Drug Lords: Barry and The Boys From Dallas To Mena
response.overview: This is the story of Barry Seal. Could the assassinations and scandals that rocked America in the 60's and 70's have been perpetrated by the same people who caused the cocaine epidemic that swept this nation during the 1980s? See the results of a three-year investigation into the life and times of one of the most famous CIA agents and successful drug smugglers in America's history - Barry Seal.
response.title: In Search of the American Drug Lords: Barry and The Boys From Dallas To Mena
